title: Janeane Garofalo And Lili Taylor: Returning To 'Marvin's Room'
description: Janeane Garofalo and Lili Taylor, the stars of the Broadway revival of 'Marvin's Room,' talk about 90s comedy and nostalgia. Then, they guess which of them said a famous line of movie and TV dialogue.
